text: Eric Shaun Lynch (March 11, 1975 - September 20, 2014), also known as Eric the Midget or Eric the Actor, was an American actor and radio personality. He was a member of The Howard Stern Show's Wack Pack from 2002 until his death. He also appeared in television series such as In Plain Sight, Fringe, Legit and American Dreams. Lynch was born in Rodeo, California. He was tall, which would make him a dwarf, and weighed . He also used a motorized wheelchair. He claimed to have outlived every doctor's lifespan that was given to him. Lynch died from multiple organ failure on September 20, 2014 at a hospital in Sacramento, California. He was 39. ==References== ==Other websites== *Card Player profile * Hendon Mob profile *WPT profile * WSOP profile Category:1975 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Contra Costa County, California Category:American movie actors Category:American radio personalities Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Deaths from liver failure Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure Category:Disease-related deaths in California Category:Actors from Sacramento, California
title: Eric Lynch
